strapiPost.title: Pinky Swear Officially Open At The 1907 In Downtown Rogers
strapiPost.content:
We had the chance to check out Pinky Swear at The 1907 in Downtown Rogers and immediately fell in love with this new, swanky, Tokyo record-bar-inspired cocktail lounge.

  • On the menu: The menu offers food from the kitchen crew behind the esteemed Heirloom. The Kim-Cheese Pizza, made with in-house kimchi, and the fall-off-the-bone Strawberry Gochujang Ribs were phenomenal. After dinner, we satisfied our sweet tooth with a Yuzu Cheesecake Popsicle.
  • On the record: Pinky Swear exclusively plays vinyl records on a stereo, and even the menu is styled after a record sleeve with many of the cocktail names paying tribute to hit songs. We'd recommend the Snoop Lion, Byrhh Mama, or Latchkey Kid.

No reservations needed. Pinky Swear will be open Wed-Thurs, 5-10p, and Fri-Sat, 5-11p or later. Follow Pinky Swear on Insta HERE.
